column4: The outbound right lane is backed up between S Locust Hill Dr and New Circle Rd due to an event at the old Walmart store location.
Expect delays until further notice or take an alternate route if possible.
Outer loop New Circle Rd prior to Harrodsburg Rd.
The ferry is back open.  It has been closed due to high water conditions.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
